name: Vladimir Alexandrovich Orlov
bio: Vladimir Alexandrovich Orlov (born January 6, 1938, Baku, Azerbaijan SSR) is a Belarusian film director, screenwriter, and writer.

name: Maisey Zalmanavich Beray
bio: Maisey Zalmanavich Beray (23 snezhnya 1909, Velizh — 2003, Minsk) — Belarusian film operator, film documentary. Honored dzeyach mastatstvay BSSR (1967).

name: Olga Dashuk
bio: Olga Dashuk is a Belarusian film director and screenwriter of documentary films, journalist and film critic. Participant and prize-winner of international film festivals, including "Listapad", "BelarusDocs", "IDFA", "DOK Leipzig", "Cinema du Reel" (Paris), "Silverdocs" (Washington)," Rotterdam IFF", "HotDocs" (Toronto), "Prix Europa" (Berlin), "Krakow IFF" (Poland). Member of the film festival jury»Cinema Perpetum mobile". He is a member of the Belarusian Association of Journalists.

name: Alexey Poluyan
bio: Alexey Poluyan (born October 18, 1989, Baranovichi) is a Belarusian documentary and feature film director, participant of international film festivals.

name: Mikhail Mikalayevich Ptashuk
bio: Mikhail Nikolayevich Ptashuk (28 January 1943, V. Fedyuki, Lyakhovichsky district-26 April 2002) was a Belarusian film director, actor, and producer.

name: Anatoly Antonovich Schneider
bio: Anatoly Antonovich Schneider (13 October 1930, Porechye village, Tolochinsky district, Vitebsk region) is a Belarusian journalist, local historian, and film director. Member of the Union of Journalists of the USSR( 1991), member of the Belarusian Association of UNESCO Clubs.
